sentences.sContent: Which he used to disparage defective vehicles, dates back to his time as a second-hand car dealer in the late 1970s, and suggests a dishonestly adjusted mileometer .
sentences.sContent_eng: Which he used to disparage defective vehicles, dates back to his time as a second-hand car dealer in the late 1970s, and suggests a dishonestly adjusted mileometer .
sentences.sCn: 这是一句他常用来贬损故障车的话，可回溯到1970年代晚期他做二手车经销商的时候，暗指被动过手脚的里程表。

sentences.sContent: The article introduced the measurement principle, hardware circuit and software process of a kind of mine locomotive intelligent speed mileometer, which have the function of "black box".
sentences.sContent_eng: The article introduced the measurement principle, hardware circuit and software process of a kind of mine locomotive intelligent speed mileometer, which have the function of "black box".
sentences.sCn: 介绍了一种具有黑匣子功能的矿机车智能型速度里程表的测量原理、硬件电路设计和软件程序流程。

sentences.sContent: In the article, the measurement principle, hardware circuit and software process of a kind of mine locomotive intelligent speed mileometer are introduced, which have the function of "black box".
sentences.sContent_eng: In the article, the measurement principle, hardware circuit and software process of a kind of mine locomotive intelligent speed mileometer are introduced, which have the function of "black box".
sentences.sCn: 前言： 介绍具有黑匣子功能的矿机车智能型速度里程表的测量原理、硬件电路设计和软件程序流程。

trans.tranOther: an instrument in a car that shows how many miles it has travelled
